To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

To Whom It May Concern:
Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:
Wednesday, December 13, 2023
All records showing the number of Certified Jailers and Police/Sheriff Deputies Employed

January the 1st 2013 until October 20, 2023

2. A list of all Certified Jailers and Police/Sheriff Deputies that have quit or resigned from 01/01/2013 to October 20, 2023.
The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.
In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available, or CD-ROM if not.
Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.
Sincerely,
Bernadette Feazell

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any documents pertaining to collaboration between the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) and the production of the 2008 movie "Uncertainty," directed by Scott McGehee and David Siegel and starring Joseph Gordon-Levitt. I request any and all documents pertaining to NASA support for "Uncertainty." Such documents may include but should not be limited to: script notes; production assistance agreements; and all records of communications between employees of NASA and members of the cast, crew, and production company of "Uncertainty," including memos, notes of meetings and conference calls, emails, and other forms of communication.

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply.

Attached to this request are three documents: (1) a list of NASA-supported TV and films productions spanning the years 2006-2015 (a list which includes "Uncertainty"); (2) a letter with the DCF letterhead for purposes of fee waiver; and (3) the 501c3 application and approval for the DCF.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any documents pertaining to collaboration between the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) and the production of the 2009 movie "Space Buddies," directed by Robert Vince and distributed by Disney. I request any and all documents pertaining to NASA support for "Space Buddies." Such documents may include but should not be limited to: script notes; production assistance agreements; and all records of communications between employees of NASA and members of the cast, crew, and production company of "Space Buddies," including memos, notes of meetings and conference calls, emails, and other forms of communication.

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply. 

Attached to this request are three documents: (1) a list of NASA-supported TV and films productions spanning the years 2006-2015 (a list which includes "Space Buddies"); (2) a letter with the DCF letterhead for purposes of fee waiver; and (3) the 501c3 application and approval for the DCF.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo
